main.name: Ted Ahn
main.description: Building the future of finance and automation with extensive experience in scalable systems and ethical AI applications.
main.bio: I am a Senior Software Engineer with a deep passion for bridging enterprise-scale engineering with modern AI solutions. My journey spans from building reactive streaming platforms at USAA to modernizing data pipelines and ML infrastructure at Capital One. I believe in 'Customer-Oriented' engineeringâ€”where technical excellence meets real-world impact.
main.contactmessage: Always open to discussing new projects, creative ideas, or opportunities.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Inspired by the products that shaped my childhood, I started my journey here. I wanted to do more than just use technology; I wanted to build it with values and purpose.

education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Computer Science
education.description: I gained a deep respect for the fundamentals that still guide me in my engineering decisions today.

education.degree: Post Graduate Program, Artificial Intelligence & Machine Learning
education.description: I took my first steps to rebuild my mathematical foundations and learn to train AI and ML models to master both Engineering and Model Development.

achievements.title: Data Analysis Pipeline
achievements.desc: As the first US engineer intern, I was given freedom to explore. I prototyped a data analysis pipeline that demonstrated the power of data to understand users.

achievements.title: Formation of Data Science Team
achievements.desc: My work helped validate the need for a dedicated Data Science team.

achievements.title: Enabling Real-Time
achievements.desc: I joined to help build USAA's first real-time, event-driven communications platform. We set the standard for proven design of safe and scalable real-time systems.

achievements.title: Architecting Standard
achievements.desc: Then, I helped other teams replicate our success, turning the project into an enterprise standard.

achievements.title: Modernizing Data Pipelines
achievements.desc: I stepped into a massive modernization effort, designing an event-driven pipeline that powers the Auto Navigator platform today.

work.status: Promoted and Team Switched to Marketing Navigator
work.title: Senior Software Engineer

achievements.title: Focus on Quality
achievements.desc: As a Senior Engineer, I took ownership of our infrastructure, leading AWS migrations and defining SRE practices for the org.

achievements.title: Growing Integrations
achievements.desc: I delivered a proof-of-concept integrating Google Vehicle Listing Ads, bridging our backend with new marketing possibilities.

achievements.title: Focus on Python
achievements.desc: I saw the wave of AI coming and pivoted to meet it. I took on Python and EMR data processing projects to bridge the gap between Engineering and Data Science.

achievements.title: Focus on MLOps
achievements.desc: I built the model training and deployment pipelines using Kubeflow to allow our Data Scientists to deploy models faster.

projects.title: AI & ML Project Portfolio
projects.description: A collection of my practical AI/ML projects, including 'EasyVisa Outcome Prediction' and 'Personal Loan Conversion' models. Features end-to-end notebooks demonstrating data preprocessing, model training, and evaluation.

projects.title: Timeline Resume
projects.description: The modern react portfolio you are looking at right now. Built with React 18, Vite, and Glassmorphism UI.
